segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, not noticing anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is running, water pouring out over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming on the floor right by her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it already, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the left, there's a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem excited about their little secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, such a contrast to this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon before something happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
